dcterms:creator: Dave Zhenyu Chen
Angel X Chang
Matthias Nie√üner
dcterms:description: The ScanRefer dataset annotates 800 3D indoor scenes in the ScanNet dataset with 51,583 language queries. It follows the official ScanNet splits and contains 36,665, 9,508, and 5,410 samples in train/val/test sets, respectively.
dcterms:title: ScanRefer

dcterms:creator: Panos Achlioptas
Ahmed Abdelreheem
Fei Xia
Mohamed Elhoseiny
Leonidas Guibas
dcterms:description: The Natural Reference in 3D (Nr3D) dataset has the same train/val split as ScanRefer. It contains 41,503 queries annotated by Amazon Mechanical Turk workers. Compared with ScanRefer, Nr3D is more challenging since it does not contain fixed or redundant sentence patterns.
dcterms:title: Nr3D
